categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Tango Group was a squadron of five Gamma-class ATR-6 assault transports that saw service with the Rebel Alliance. They were sent to pick up several Bothans who were sympathetic to the Alliance; because of these sympathies they were due to be sold into slavery by the Galactic Empire. After the Sentinel-class landing craft KDT carrying them were disabled by Y-wings, one of which was piloted by Ace Azzameen, the transports moved in, liberated the slaves and brought them back to the Mon Calamari Star Cruiser Liberty.
